The `hello` package contains functionality for generating greetings.

## Installation

To install `hello`, install the `devtools` package and run the following command in the R terminal:

```{r}
#| eval: false
devtools::install_github('BIFX545-25/hello')
```

## Examples

The main function in this package is `hello`. Here are a few examples of how to use it.

```{r}
library(hello)

hello('BIFX 545 students')

hello('Dr Johnson')
```
